challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: You should have a new p element within your .calories-info element.
You should have a new span element within your .calories-info element.
Your p element should come after your .small-text element.
Your span element should come after your .left-container element.

description: Below your .small-text element, create a new p element with the text Calories. Also below the .left-container element, create a new span element with the text 230.
